sections.heading: County; powers; vote of electors not required
sections.text: In exercising any or all of the powers granted to the county in sections 39-855 to 39-876, the governing body of the county may act, and no vote of the electors of the county shall be required.SourceLaws 1935, c. 87, ยง 9, p. 283;C.S.Supp.,1941, ยง 39-2109
